title: WHO Calls for Halt on Third Covid 'Booster Shots', Points to Global Vaccine Inequality
content:
1. WHO Calls for Halt on Third Covid 'Booster Shots', Points to Global Vaccine Inequality  News18
  2. UPDATE 4-WHO calls for halting COVID-19 vaccine boosters in favor of unvaccinated  Yahoo Finance
  3. White House rebuffs WHO's calls for a moratorium on vaccine booster shots  The Denver Channel
  4. Delta variant is now in 135 countries, says WHO, as director-general calls for moratorium on boosters to allow poorer countries get first doses  MarketWatch
  5. Germany vaccine rollout: Official plans Covid-19 booster shots from September • FRANCE 24 English  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
